abstract: Remember when the sale of Bear Stearns for $2 — sorry, make that $10 — a share and the controversy over whether Yahoo would be sold to Microsoft seemed like the biggest financial stories ever?
lead_paragraph: Remember when the sale of Bear Stearns for $2 — sorry, make that $10 — a share and the controversy over whether Yahoo would be sold to Microsoft seemed like the biggest financial stories ever?

headline.main: The Financial Meltdown Will Be YouTubed
